Reviews.Title: “Learn From Our Mistake”
Reviews.Author: IWantMyMTV
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel close dont picture fool lobby glass walkways leading checkin counter opposite door leading vending machine drive car door booked motel slightly converted ramada name attached name ramada suggests nice stay seedy start town looking major highway leading city running outside hotel dont fooled plenty sketchy characters appear engaged somewhat questionable activities mulling appeared clean toilet looked appeared drops urine toilet seat bathroom smelled bleach chose nonsmoking smell smoke vent wafted throughout night cleaning staff spoke little english tried hard sympathetic spent five minutes talking cleaning staff understanding able communicate finally left towels moved spent night skeeved disappointed left morning meeting scheduled nights overall hotel left desired uneasy feeling hotel caused marriott shower skin peeled waste money hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed with everything”
Reviews.Author: katnkradle
Reviews.Content: traveled husband teen daughter 2 sons mother chose hotel price range close baltimore city kids time pool impeccably clean 3 days maid service clean towels linens continental breakfast day staff courteous helpful definitely stay

HotelInfo.Name: Ramada Limited Baltimore
HotelInfo.Address: 6422 Baltimore National Parkway, Baltimore, MD 21228 (Formerly Knights Inn)
